trans-unit.source: Configure the Bare Metal Recovery

seg-source.mrk: Configure the Bare Metal Recovery

target.mrk: Configurer le Bare Metal Recovery

trans-unit.source: Boot the Atempo <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> BMR disk or the ISO image delivered with the product.

seg-source.mrk: Boot the Atempo <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> BMR disk or the ISO image delivered with the product.

target.mrk: Démarrez le disque Atempo <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> BMR ou lancez l’image ISO fournie avec le produit.

trans-unit.source: Select the keyboard to use, then click Apply.

seg-source.mrk: Select the keyboard to use, then click Apply.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez le clavier à utiliser, puis cliquez sur Apply.

trans-unit.source: Select the time zone to ensure a match with the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> settings for instance analysis.

seg-source.mrk: Select the time zone to ensure a match with the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> settings for instance analysis.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez le fuseau horaire pour garantir une cohérence avec les paramètres <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> pour l'analyse des instances.

trans-unit.source: Click Apply and quit.

seg-source.mrk: Click Apply and quit.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Apply and quit.

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable><MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> displays (<MadCap:xref href="#welcome_BMR_module" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable><MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> displays (<MadCap:xref href="#welcome_BMR_module" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable><MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> s'affiche (<MadCap:xref href="#welcome_BMR_module" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Enter the fully qualified name of the workstation server or the network address in the Select Server window, then click Continue.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the fully qualified name of the workstation server or the network address in the Select Server window, then click Continue.

target.mrk: Entrez le nom complet du serveur de poste de travail ou l'adresse réseau dans la fenêtre Select Server, puis cliquez sur Continue.

trans-unit.source: Welcome screen to set up the BMR module

seg-source.mrk: Welcome screen to set up the BMR module

target.mrk: Écran de bienvenue pour configurer le module BMR

trans-unit.source: Enter the restore token, then click Continue.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the restore token, then click Continue.

target.mrk: Saisissez le jeton de restauration, puis cliquez sur Continue.

trans-unit.source: See <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Tokens</MadCap:xref> for more details.

seg-source.mrk: See <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Tokens</MadCap:xref> for more details.

target.mrk: Voir <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Tokens</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Restore token screen

seg-source.mrk: Restore token screen

target.mrk: Écran jeton de restauration

trans-unit.source: Select the workstation to restore, then click Continue.

seg-source.mrk: Select the workstation to restore, then click Continue.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez le poste de travail à restaurer, puis cliquez sur Continue.

trans-unit.source: The list only displays workstations available for disaster recovery (<MadCap:xref href="#bmr_available_workstations" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: The list only displays workstations available for disaster recovery (<MadCap:xref href="#bmr_available_workstations" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: La liste affiche uniquement les postes de travail pour lesquels la récupération de données est disponible (<MadCap:xref href="#bmr_available_workstations" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Workstations available for disaster recovery

seg-source.mrk: Workstations available for disaster recovery

target.mrk: Postes de travail disponibles pour la récupération de données

trans-unit.source: In the Available Versions interface, choose one of the following options (see Figure):

seg-source.mrk: In the Available Versions interface, choose one of the following options (see Figure):

target.mrk: Dans l'interface Versions disponibles, choisissez l'une des options suivantes (see Figure) :

trans-unit.source: Select the version to restore.

seg-source.mrk: Select the version to restore.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez la version des fichiers à restaurer.

trans-unit.source: Select the Get latest version to see updated protection configuration and layout option to restore the latest bootstrap files. If you choose this option, you cannot select the version manually.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Get latest version to see updated protection configuration and layout option to restore the latest bootstrap files.
If you choose this option, you cannot select the version manually.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez l'option Get latest version to see updated protection configuration and layout pour ne restaurer que les derniers fichiers bootstrap.
Si vous sélectionnez cette option, vous ne pourrez pas sélectionner la version manuellement.

trans-unit.source: Available versions to restore

seg-source.mrk: Available versions to restore

target.mrk: Versions disponibles à la restauration

trans-unit.source: An error message displays if the saved machine firmware is different from the current one. In that case, the workstation recovery is not possible.

seg-source.mrk: An error message displays if the saved machine firmware is different from the current one.
In that case, the workstation recovery is not possible.

target.mrk: Un message d’erreur s’affiche si le firmware du poste de travail sauvegardé est différent de celui du poste actuel.
Dans ce cas, la restauration du poste de travail n’est pas possible.

trans-unit.source: Click Continue.

seg-source.mrk: Click Continue.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Continue.

trans-unit.source: The Disk Layout Editor is displayed (<MadCap:xref href="#bmr_disk_layout_editor" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>). The disks already on the restored workstation are marked in green.

seg-source.mrk: The Disk Layout Editor is displayed (<MadCap:xref href="#bmr_disk_layout_editor" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).
The disks already on the restored workstation are marked in green.

target.mrk: Le Disk Layout Editor s'affiche (<MadCap:xref href="#bmr_disk_layout_editor" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).
Les disques déjà détectés sur le poste de travail actuel s'affichent en vert.

trans-unit.source: Disk Layout Editor

seg-source.mrk: Disk Layout Editor

target.mrk: Disk Layout Editor
